text: 1997 FIFA World Youth Championship was held in Malaysia from 16 June to 5 July. == Qualification == The following 24 teams qualified for the 1997 FIFA World Youth Championship. Host Malaysia did not have to qualify for the tournament. Confederation Qualifying tournament Qualifier(s) AFC (Asia) Host nation AFC (Asia) 1996 AFC Youth Championship CAF (Africa) 1997 African Youth Championship CONCACAF (North, Central America & Caribbean) 1996 CONCACAF U-20 Tournament CONMEBOL (South America) 1997 South American Youth Championship OFC (Oceania) 1997 OFC U-20 Championship UEFA (Europe) 1996 UEFA European Under-18 Football Championship :1.Teams that made their debut. ==Results== RSSSF ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 6 1 +5 7 align=left 3 1 2 0 4 2 +2 5 align=left 3 1 1 1 4 4 0 4 align=left 3 3 0 0 15 9 -7 9 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 15 3 +12 9 align=left 3 2 0 1 8 7 +1 6 align=left 3 0 1 2 2 6 -4 1 align=left 3 0 1 2 5 14 -9 1 ====Group C==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 4 2 +2 7 align=left 3 1 1 1 4 4 0 4 align=left 3 1 0 2 2 3 -1 3 align=left 3 0 2 1 2 3 -1 2 ====Group D==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 8 2 +6 9 align=left 3 1 1 1 10 7 +3 4 align=left 3 0 2 1 5 6 -1 2 align=left 3 0 1 2 3 11 -8 1 ====Group E==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 5 3 +2 7 align=left 3 2 0 1 8 5 +3 6 align=left 3 1 1 1 3 3 0 4 align=left 3 0 0 3 1 6 -5 0 ====Group F==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 8 1 +7 9 align=left 3 1 1 1 6 2 +4 4 align=left 3 1 0 2 2 10 -8 3 align=left 3 0 1 2 2 5 -3 1 ===Knockout stage=== {{Round16 |||3||0 |||0||1 |||0||1 |||3||0 |||2||0 |||2||1 |||1||2 |||10||0 |||1 (7)||1 (6) |||1||2 |||0||1 |||2||0 |||3||2 |||0||1 |||1||2 |||1||2 |widescore=yes}} ==References== Category:1997 in association football Category:1997 in Asia Category:Football in Malaysia Category:FIFA World Youth Championship
